resources.string: "Stargate Asgard/Wraith/Ancient/Goa'uld/Furling/Nox translator enter text you want to translate bellow enjoy it :)"
"Ancient is the name given to the language spoken and written by the Alterans and their descendants, the Ancients and the Ori. The language is fairly similar to Latin spoken on Earth."
"This language is believed to have influenced some of the Germanic languages on Earth called Futhark on earth."
"The language of the Wraith is a derivative of the language of the Ancients. The Wraith use a series of symbols which are similar to the Ancient alphabet"

"This language is the main form of communication for the Goa'uld, the Tok'ra, and the Jaffa races. Several human cultures under the rule of the Goa'uld also speak the Goa'uld tongue, either as their main communication or in addition to their own. Though there are several dialects, there appears to be one common to all Goa'uld, Tok'ra, and Jaffa."
"Nox is the language spoken widely spoken by the Nox. Though the language sounds completely alien to most Humans from Earth, Anteaus told SG-1 that it would take time to learn their language."
"The Tau'ri have only encountered these writings twice, once on the planet Heliopolis and the other time on the planet P5X-777 where there was a portal leading to the paradise on the Utopian moon."
